message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this truly exceptional product.  Given its unique value proposition, I'm confident it will be a significant asset to you. I propose a starting price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $1,350,000?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I recognize your desired price point, the value this product brings is truly unique.  I could consider coming down to $1,380,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.
